title: 4JStudios: 欧洲PS3/PS4版九月销量登顶
author: a20001017
txt_content:
4JStudios: WOOHOO!  #MinecraftPS4 and #MinecraftPS3 top the Europe PlayStation Store charts for September!http://blog.eu.playstation.com/2014/10/09/playstation-store-charts-september/ …

4JStudios: 哇吼！ #MinecraftPS4和#MinecraftPS3在九月欧洲PlayStation Store销量排行榜上登顶！



It was a real battle of the titans on PS4 last month, with Destiny, Minecraft and FIFA 15 all debuting. Who won the day? It was close, but Mojang’s world-building phenomenon took the crown – and held onto the top spot on PS3 too.

上个月的PS4销量排行榜上竞争激烈，《命运》、Minecraft、和FIFA 15初展身手。谁将会是赢家？马上揭晓答案：Mojang的世界建造游戏奇迹般地夺得首位——也在PS3排行榜上名列榜首。

Minecraft（新）命运（新）FIFA 15（新）恶名昭彰:破晓（2）美国末日:重制（1）
